name: SET POOL HEAT SELECT TO "NONE" + START SKIMMER RUNTIME
Query
func:
msg.query = `from(bucket: "homeassistant")
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "POOL")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "LastHeatSelect?")
  |> group()
  |> last()`;
return msg;

name: That script brings chrome to the front of all windows and checks active page title.
This uses iot link to execute an autohotkey script that has been compiled into a .exe on jarvis.
It then writes that page title to a txt file that is monitored by the "file in" node for the pesense of reg ex's that match the pages that i am looking for.

name: no.guest
info:
person.guest not home for 1hrs= no.guest

 1hrs=gate keeper for if guest home signal not present, send guest not_home for remainder of time, after, send no.guest. If guest returns, reset 1hrs clock.

name: person.guest
info: open + close keeps gates in opposition. this way person.guest = home or away and then resets after 3hrs of not home.

name: PoolHeat?
info:
**PoolHeat?:**
This flow answers the question: PoolHeat?
**3 CONDITIONS:**
1. HVAC State
2. FPH HEAT SELECT
3. $PH HEAT SELECT
**OUTPUT:**
FPH
HOT
IDLE
NPH
$PH
**Used next in flow: PoolLogic**
PoolHeat + PoolLogic= Actions/Movements
Conditions:
1. PoolHeat State
2. HVAC States
3. Pool State

name: [s] to [hh:mm:ss]
gate control/1second time rate count start/stop
RESET COUNTER IF IDLE/OFF. RATHER RELY ON VALUE SAVED IN DATABASE
gate control: stop interference of database while saving/reseting
@ END OF DAY, SAVE CURRENT VALUE & RESET TO 0 TO START NEW RUNTIME
start/stop: if/ save value to database

name: NEED TO DO!!
info:
NEED TO DO:
SONOFF TH16 mount, rewire, soilder temp sensor
Pool Pump Suction Side air leak: At 3/4" tee? remove!
Add temp sensor to hvac liquid line
ADD SECOND TEMP SENSOR TO FPH HE. 1 ON WATER IN, 2ND ON WATER OUT. 
WHY DOES HVAC ACTION: runtime_seconds RESET TO 0 IF I COPY SUB TO FLOW FOR TESTING?
SET HVAC TEMP MANUALLY WILL PAUSE SCHEDULE. CONTINUES AFTER DARK?
InfluxDB: create buckets w/ different retention policies
Skimmer_EOD_RUNTIME clock
Disable zone automations 12hrs if human interaction present.
Rebuild Motion Multipliers
Guest Mode= inovelli dimmer interaction in guest or office, sets Guest modes

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
COMPLETED BELOW:
1. MAKE FPH OVERTEMP LOGIC DEFAULT TO FAIL SAFE. 
--THIS IS NOT IDEAL:
----- IF ANY POOL WATER TEMP PROBES BECOME "null"IT TRIGGERS OVERTEMP.
----- POSSIBLE COULD REWRITE TO LOOK FOR "null" AND SHUT OFF FPH: MANUEL/SCHEDULED + NOTIFY IOS
2. MAKE DAILY SCHEDULE CAPABLE OF BEING MANUELLY SHUTOFF VIA HA
3. EXPORT FPH DATA TO INFLUXDB
4.  "FPH OVERTEMP LOGIC" ommit from logic: everything except active FPH modes
5. Securty Flow: 
Have InfluxDB track home state. 
If I experience a system reboot
 (ie: unraid restart/upgrade) 
Then at NR startup it checks InfluxDB State and doesn't 
Unlock the house because it thinks we just arrived 
Home. We was already home mofo, with house
Locked!
6. Monitordatabase function for waterfall
7. VALVE1:LOGIC-NEED A HALFWAY AKA MAX FLOW SETTING. CURRENTLY: SKIMMER or POOLDRAIN.
8. PUT FLOW SWITCH INLINE WITH 24VAC FOR HVAC COMPRESSOR. ULTIMATE FAIL SAFE. SEE #4.  
9. MOUNT TH16 TO WALL.
10. FIX SPA BLOWER PIPES, FILL FOOTING WITH ROCKS
11. MORE TESTING ON WITH POOL HEAT/POOL MODES SUBFLOWS
12. Pool Water Leak: fixed, found spa blower pipes not glued, repaired!
13. Skimmer: set PoolHeat?:NPH at start, return to previous at finish.
14. POOL.RELAYS.3 NEES REPLACED! BAD R2
15. pool.relays.2 Interlock 2,3 // Interlock on
16. Pool Pump contactor remove Jasco, replace w/ siemens.
17. FIX SPA HEATER
18. FIX SPA BOOSTER PUMP. NEED TO REDO CONTACTOR, WAS 24VDC. MAKE IT 24VAC

{payload: "âEach morning we are born again. What we do today is what matters most.â â Buddha"},
{payload: "âMake each day your masterpiece.â â John Wooden"},
{payload: "âYour imagination is your preview of lifeâs coming attractions.â â Albert Einstein"},

{payload: "âItâs time to start living the life youâve imagined.â â Henry James"},
{payload: "âThe difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.â â Jimmy Johnson"},
{payload: "âIt is never too late to be what you might have been.â â George Elliot"},
{payload: "âYour time is limited, so donât waste it living someone elseâs life.â â Steve Jobs"},
{payload: "âLife is what we make it, always has been, always will be.â â Grandma Moses"},
{payload: "âThe journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.â â Lao Tzu"},
{payload: "âHappiness is not something readymade. It comes from your own actions.â â Dalai Lama"},
{payload: "âWhen I let go of what I am, I become what I might be.â â Lao Tzu"},
{payload: "âEither you run the day, or the day runs you.â â Jin Rohn"},
{payload: "âThough no one can go back and make a brand new start, anyone can start from now and make a brand new ending.â â Carl Bard"},
{payload: "âWhat lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.â â Henry S. Haskins"},
{payload: "âThe best way to predict the future is to invent it.â â Alan Kay"},
{payload: "âIf you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.â â Napoleon Hill"},
{payload: "âYou make a living by what you get; you make a life by what you give.â â Winston Churchill"},
{payload: "âKeep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow.â â Helen Keller"},
{payload: "âThe best way out is always through.â â Robert Frost"},
{payload: "âThe best dreams happen when youâre awake.â â Cherie Gilderbloom"},
{payload: "âDonât wait. The time will never be just right.â â Napoleon Hill"},
{payload: "âDo what you love and the money will follow.â â Marsha Sinetar"},
{payload: "âThe harder I work, the luckier I get.â â Gary Player"},
{payload: "âThe dreamers are the saviors of the world.â â James Allen"},

name: Query
READ RUNTIME SECONDS
READ RUNTIME TOTAL
func:
msg.query = `from(bucket: "homeassistant")
  |> range(start: -500m)
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "HVAC")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "runtime_total")`;
return msg;
